metadata.name: WorldTV #01
metadata.description:
I've lived in this world for 43 years. 
I remember many shameful events from coups in my country to wars between countries, from civil wars to massacres. I‚Äôve always kept my hope of leaving a more livable world to our children.
I still have hope 'cause I'm still alive.
In this series, I show the world these embarrassing scenes I remember from an old black and white TV screen.
At the same time, I will try to explain the events in the world social history in my other works.
The first item of the collection is about the war in occupied Ukraine.

*I'll collect works by one or more artists with half of the eth from the sale of the first itemü§ù artists will be artists we've never met face to face.
